Inside

In Lyon, as everywhere in France, the year 2023 was embers.
The class struggle has indeed reached several times a very high level, whether during the pension battle during which the organized working class fought with fierce and fighting spirit in June during which youth youth The most isolated proletarian has led the question of power high by directly attacking the bourgeois state, secondarily in Sainte-Soline with the intense confrontation with the repressive forces of the State around the ecological and productivist question, or with the support for the Palestinian national resistance following the history offensive of October 7.

We have said it on several occasions: nothing will ever be as before, and it is truly a "new time" that opens, the era of proletarian revolutions.
For this it is the duty of revolutionaries to maintain political agitation, to denounce the imperialists as soon as possible, and to participate in all the struggles of the masses, because it is the masses that make history.

In Lyon, activists from the Revolutionary Youth League (LJR) continued to seize their tasks, plunging themselves into proletarian masses and youth.
Thus, activists of the LJR were able to go alongside farmers on the blocking of Saint-Quentin-Fallavier.
It is obvious that it is essential for revolutionaries to be present where the masses are fighting, even if they are not at the origin of mobilizations as in this situation.
It is also obvious that all the claims brought cannot be 100% shared by the revolutionaries, but a movement cannot be changed from the outside!
In addition, this movement is nevertheless mainly fair and we share the demands of the peasant masses: being able to live with its work, expropriating the monopolies, put an end to the business of the food industry.

LJR activists have also carried out numerous agitation and propaganda actions, around the farmers' struggle in addition to support for movement, but not only.

We have indeed been able to observe in the streets of the capital of the Gaulle many messages in tribute to Pierre Overney or to the Manouchian group.
New Epoque has sent several articles to these major figures of the proletariat which gave their lives for the Revolution and for the cause of the people! ( https://www.nouvelleepoque.fr/pierre-overney-heros-de-la-classe-ouvriere-50-ans-plus-tard-nous-hissons-toujours-le-drapeau-rouge/ ; https://www.nouvelleepoque.fr/missak-manouchian-au-panthon-vraiment/ )
By realizing the last sacrifice, these heroes of the proletariat carried the red flag of the immortal commune of Paris very high, marking a glorious page of the fight against revisionism with their blood.
In addition, numerous propaganda actions in favor of the Palestinian national resistance have been carried out. Indeed, after almost 150 days of war, the resistance continues to inflict a terrible camouflet on the imperialists Yankees and its lackey, the Zionist criminal state, always showing the real fragility of the imperialists, torn between all the fronts in practice which threaten to open up during this period of rotting of imperialism. The Palestinian national resistance shows us by its heroic struggle that must be dare to fight to overcome!

The LJR also participated in the Gathering organized in front of the German Consulate In early January at the side of pro-Palestinian activists, following the attack on the LLL (Lenine-Liebknecht-Luxembourg) demonstration by German police due to the support displayed in the Palestinian Army Resistance.

New time also wishes to salute and support the pro-Palestinian activists victims of an incredible repression following a propaganda action Consisting in paint urban stairs in the colors of the Palestine flag. In total, more than a hundred hours of childcare, several searches, we can see once again on which side the interests of the French bourgeoisie are stored!
